casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Lekkie Constantine WILSON. No. 436A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Kevin Anderson, Assistant Attorney General, Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State of NC, L. Jayne Stowers, Winston-Salem, for Wilson. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 665 S.E.2d 751 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 17th day of September 2008 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th day of October 2008."
